assignments.description: Given no SLA applies, clear all the SLA related fields.
assignments.name: Clear_SLA_values
assignments.label: Clear SLA values

assignments.name: Set_flag_that_pre_advice_retirement_meeting_is_required
assignments.label: Set flag that pre-advice retirement meeting is required

assignments.name: Set_related_advice_and_parking_lot
assignments.label: Set related advice and parking lot

assignments.name: Set_related_advice_and_parking_lot_0
assignments.label: Set related advice and parking lot

decisions.description: Actions to be triggered off of changes to particular statuses from something else. For deck complete, we only trigger this change where there is no advice checklist because the advice checklist process itself triggers this task.
decisions.name: Advice_status_change
decisions.label: Advice status

decisions.description: Checks if LOAs have been marked as complete
decisions.name: LOAs_completed_node
decisions.label: LOAs completed?

decisions.description: Checks if LOAs have been marked as complete
decisions.name: Profile_complete
decisions.label: Profile complete?

decisions.description: Checks if retirement call has been marked as complete
decisions.name: Retirement_call
decisions.label: Retirement call

decisions.description: Checks if LOAs have been marked as complete
decisions.name: Risk_call_complete
decisions.label: Risk call complete?

decisions.description: Checks if LOAs have been marked as complete
decisions.name: RTQs_complete
decisions.label: RTQs complete?

decisions.name: Within_5_years_of_or_in_retirement
decisions.label: Within 5 years of or in retirement?

Flow.description: Flow to manage automation off the back of changes to advice records.

formulas.description: Returns true if this is a new record.
formulas.name: is_new
retirementCallNotesNotRequired
formulas.expression: "Retirement call not required because " & IF(ISPICKVAL({!Check_for_previous_retirement_call.RetirementCallStatus__c}, "COMPLETED"), "one has already been completed.", "we have previously recorded they will never need one.")

formulas.description: The start date that should apply when monitoring compliance with the status's SLA
formulas.name: status_start_date

formulas.description: The date only from from the suitability meeting date/time on the advice record.
formulas.name: suitability_meeting_date

formulas.description: Converts the warning offset into a negative number to be used in the flow that calculates the warning/amber date.
formulas.name: warning_offset

Flow.interviewLabel: Advice - after save flow | created or edited {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Advice | After save flow | Created or Edited

recordLookups.description: Looks up records in the SLA custom metadata type to see if any SLA applies for this status and sets the values accordingly if so.
recordLookups.name: Check_for_SLA
recordLookups.label: Check for SLA

recordLookups.name: Get_tasks_related_to_advice_out_of
recordLookups.label: Get parking lot tasks related to advice

subflows.description: Use the subflow to add the SLA in business days to the status start date.
subflows.name: Calculate_status_due_date
subflows.label: Calculate status due date

subflows.description: Use the subflow to subtract the warning date offset in business days from the status due date.
subflows.name: Calculate_status_warning_date
subflows.label: Calculate status warning date

subflows.name: Create_task_set_up_follow_on_advice
subflows.label: Create task - set up follow on advice

subflows.name: Get_clients_to_check_for_pre_advice_requirement
subflows.label: Get clients to check for pre-advice requirement

variables.description: The review record linked to this advice.
variables.name: review_linked
